verses.verse: Forasmuch <S%G1895><s%> as many <S%G4183><s%> have taken in hand <S%G2021><s%> to set forth in order <S%G392><s%> a declaration <S%G1335><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> those things <S%G4229><s%> which are most surely believed <S%G4135><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> us, <S%G2254><s%>

Even as <S%G2531><s%> they delivered <S%G3860><s%> them unto us, <S%G2254><s%> which from the beginning were <S%G1096><s%> <S%G575><s%> <S%G746><s%> eyewitnesses, <S%G845><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ministers <S%G5257><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> word; <S%G3056><s%>

It seemed good <S%G1380><s%> to me also, <S%G2504><s%> having had perfect <S%G199><s%> understanding <S%G3877><s%> of all things <S%G3956><s%> from the very first, <S%G509><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> in order, <S%G2517><s%> most excellent <S%G2903><s%> Theophilus, <S%G2321><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> thou mightest know <S%G1921><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> certainty <S%G803><s%> of those things, <S%G3056><s%> wherein <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3739><s%> thou hast been instructed. <S%G2727><s%>

There was <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> of Herod, <S%G2264><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> king <S%G935><s%> of Judea, <S%G2449><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> priest <S%G2409><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Zacharias, <S%G2197><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the course <S%G2183><s%> of Abijah: <S%G7><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> was of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> daughters <S%G2364><s%> of Aaron, <S%G2><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> was Elisabeth. <S%G1665><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> both <S%G297><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> walking <S%G4198><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> commandments <S%G1785><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ordinances <S%G1345><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> blameless. <S%G273><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they had <S%G2258><s%> <S%G846><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> child, <S%G5043><s%> because that <S%G2530><s%> Elisabeth <S%G1665><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> barren, <S%G4723><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they both <S%G297><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> now well stricken <S%G4260><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> years. <S%G2250><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass, <S%G1096><s%> that while he <S%G846><s%> executed the priest's office <S%G2407><s%> before <S%G1725><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> order <S%G5010><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> course, <S%G2183><s%>

According <S%G2596><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> custom <S%G1485><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> priest's office, <S%G2405><s%> his lot was <S%G2975><s%> to burn incense <S%G2370><s%> when he went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> whole <S%G3956><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> praying <S%G4336><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> at the <S%G3588><s%> time <S%G5610><s%> of incense. <S%G2368><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there appeared <S%G3700><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> the right side <S%G1188><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> altar <S%G2379><s%> of incense. <S%G2368><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when Zacharias <S%G2197><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him, he was troubled, <S%G5015><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> fell <S%G1968><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> not, <S%G3361><s%> Zacharias: <S%G2197><s%> for <S%G1360><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> prayer <S%G1162><s%> is heard; <S%G1522><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> Elisabeth <S%G1665><s%> shall bear <S%G1080><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> a son, <S%G5207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thou shalt call <S%G2564><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> John. <S%G2491><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> thou <S%G4671><s%> shalt have <S%G2071><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gladness; <S%G20><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> shall rejoice <S%G5463><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> birth. <S%G1083><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he shall be <S%G2071><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall drink <S%G4095><s%> neither <S%G3364><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> strong drink; <S%G4608><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he shall be filled <S%G4130><s%> with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> even <S%G2089><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G848><s%> mother's <S%G3384><s%> womb. <S%G2836><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%> shall he turn <S%G1994><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> their <S%G846><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> shall go <S%G4281><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in the spirit <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> of Elijah, <S%G2243><s%> to turn <S%G1994><s%> the hearts <S%G2588><s%> of the fathers <S%G3962><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the children, <S%G5043><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the disobedient <S%G545><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> the wisdom <S%G5428><s%> of the just; <S%G1342><s%> to make ready <S%G2090><s%> a people <S%G2992><s%> prepared <S%G2680><s%> for the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Zacharias <S%G2197><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angel, <S%G32><s%> Whereby <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5101><s%> shall I know <S%G1097><s%> this? <S%G5124><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> an old man <S%G4246><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> well stricken <S%G4260><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> years. <S%G2250><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> Gabriel, <S%G1043><s%> that stand <S%G3936><s%> in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> am sent <S%G649><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> thee, <S%G4571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to show thee these glad tidings. <S%G2097><s%> <S%G4671><s%> <S%G5023><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> thou shalt be <S%G2071><s%> dumb, <S%G4623><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> able <S%G1410><s%> to speak, <S%G2980><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the <S%G3739><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> that these things <S%G5023><s%> shall be performed, <S%G1096><s%> because <S%G473><s%> thou <S%G3739><s%> believest <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> words, <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> shall be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> their <S%G848><s%> season. <S%G2540><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> waited for <S%G2258><s%> <S%G4328><s%> Zacharias, <S%G2197><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> marveled <S%G2296><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> tarried so long <S%G5549><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple. <S%G3485><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when he came out, <S%G1831><s%> he could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> unto them: <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they perceived <S%G1921><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he had seen <S%G3708><s%> a vision <S%G3701><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple: <S%G3485><s%> for <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> beckoned <S%G2258><s%> <S%G1269><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> remained <S%G1265><s%> speechless. <S%G2974><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass, <S%G1096><s%> that, as soon as <S%G5613><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> ministration <S%G3009><s%> were accomplished, <S%G4130><s%> he departed <S%G565><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his own <S%G848><s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> those <S%G5025><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> Elisabeth <S%G1665><s%> conceived, <S%G4815><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hid <S%G4032><s%> herself <S%G1438><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> months, <S%G3376><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Thus <S%G3779><s%> hath the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> dealt <S%G4160><s%> with me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> wherein <S%G3739><s%> he looked on <S%G1896><s%> me, to take away <S%G851><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> reproach <S%G3681><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sixth <S%G1623><s%> month <S%G3376><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> Gabriel <S%G1043><s%> was sent <S%G649><s%> from <S%G5259><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> a city <S%G4172><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%>

To <S%G4314><s%> a virgin <S%G3933><s%> espoused <S%G3423><s%> to a man <S%G435><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> was Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of David; <S%G1138><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> virgin's <S%G3933><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> was Mary. <S%G3137><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> came in <S%G1525><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Hail, <S%G5463><s%> thou that art highly favored, <S%G5487><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> is with <S%G3326><s%> thee: <S%G4675><s%> blessed <S%G2127><s%> art thou <S%G4771><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> women. <S%G1135><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when she <S%G3588><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him, she was troubled <S%G1298><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cast in her mind <S%G1260><s%> what manner <S%G4217><s%> of salutation <S%G783><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> should be. <S%G1498><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto her, <S%G846><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> not, <S%G3361><s%> Mary: <S%G3137><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> thou hast found <S%G2147><s%> favor <S%G5485><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> thou shalt conceive <S%G4815><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thy womb, <S%G1064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bring forth <S%G5088><s%> a son, <S%G5207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shalt call <S%G2564><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> JESUS. <S%G2424><s%>

He <S%G3778><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> great, <S%G3173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall be called <S%G2564><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of the Highest: <S%G5310><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> shall give <S%G1325><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> throne <S%G2362><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> David: <S%G1138><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he shall reign <S%G936><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> of Jacob <S%G2384><s%> forever; <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> there shall be <S%G2071><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> end. <S%G5056><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angel, <S%G32><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> shall this <S%G5124><s%> be, <S%G2071><s%> seeing <S%G1893><s%> I know <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a man? <S%G435><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> cousin <S%G4773><s%> Elisabeth, <S%G1665><s%> she <S%G846><s%> hath also <S%G2532><s%> conceived <S%G4815><s%> a son <S%G5207><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> her <S%G848><s%> old age: <S%G1094><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> month <S%G3376><s%> with her, <S%G846><s%> who was called <S%G2564><s%> barren. <S%G4723><s%>
For <S%G3754><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> nothing <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4487><s%> <S%G3756><s%> shall be impossible. <S%G101><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Behold <S%G2400><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> handmaid <S%G1399><s%> of the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> it unto me <S%G3427><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to thy <S%G4675><s%> word. <S%G4487><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> departed <S%G565><s%> from <S%G575><s%> her. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> arose <S%G450><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G5025><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> and went <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hill country <S%G3714><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> haste, <S%G4710><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a city <S%G4172><s%> of Judah; <S%G2448><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> of Zacharias, <S%G2197><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saluted <S%G782><s%> Elisabeth. <S%G1665><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass, <S%G1096><s%> that, when <S%G5613><s%> Elisabeth <S%G1665><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> salutation <S%G783><s%> of Mary, <S%G3137><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> babe <S%G1025><s%> leaped <S%G4640><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> her <S%G846><s%> womb; <S%G2836><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Elisabeth <S%G1665><s%> was filled <S%G4130><s%> with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost: <S%G4151><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> she spake out <S%G400><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> art thou <S%G4771><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> women, <S%G1135><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blessed <S%G2127><s%> is the <S%G3588><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> womb. <S%G2836><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> whence <S%G4159><s%> is this <S%G5124><s%> to me, <S%G3427><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> should come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> me? <S%G3165><s%>
